title: Introduction to Web Development
description: Get started with web development fundamentals and overview of the course structure.

text.body: Welcome to the Complete Web Development Bootcamp! In this course, you'll learn everything you need to become a full-stack web developer.

title: HTML Basics and Structure
description: Learn HTML fundamentals, tags, and document structure.

text.body: HTML (HyperText Markup Language) is the foundation of all web pages. Learn the basic tags and structure.

title: CSS Styling and Layouts
description: Master CSS for styling web pages and creating responsive layouts.

text.body: CSS (Cascading Style Sheets) is used to style and layout web pages. Learn selectors, properties, and layout techniques.

title: JavaScript Fundamentals
description: Learn JavaScript basics including variables, functions, and control structures.

text.body: JavaScript is the programming language of the web. Learn variables, functions, and control structures.

title: Introduction to Data Science
description: Overview of data science, its applications, and the tools we'll use throughout the course.

text.body: Data Science is an interdisciplinary field that uses scientific methods to extract insights from data.
